group_1.narration: I decided to purchase a swimsuit at the store.
This all came about when we accompanied@Shizuka for her return home, though...

group_1.textCenter: There is a place to play in the river, so it would@be a good idea to bring a swimsuit.

group_1.narration: When I told my parents, they provided@for the swimsuit's cost, as uneasy as it is@on their budget...

group_1.textCenter: Hmm, there's so many more kinds than@I thought that I'm left perplexed.
(Let's call someone from here for advice.)

group_1.textRight: ...Mhm, mhm, I see!@As for my advice...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...Asahi?
(I couldn't hear her...@Maybe the reception is bad here.)
Hello, Asahi?@Can you hear me?

group_1.textRight: ...Ah, it is a little difficult to hear you,@but it is no issue!
So...you were asking for advice on@underwater equipment!

group_1.textLeft: Eh...ah, yes.@...You could call it that too.
At the Tokime village, aside from the place where@the coming-of-age ceremony occurs,
There seems to be a waterfall that is@perfect for a [textRed:playground]...

group_1.textRight: Ah, it's a little difficult to hear you,
but there is a waterfall that makes@for a perfect [textRed:hunting ground]?

group_1.narration: When I heard the story later,@this is around the point where Asahi and I@seemed to begin our misunderstandings.

group_1.textRight: (I see, so there will be fishing@at the waterfall basin...)
(It is truly an honor to be consulted@by a survival expert!)
...For waterfall basins, the water temperature@is quite low, even in the summer.
Because of this, diving suits are essential.
As for the weapon of choice, would the@harpoon be your specialty, Miss Chika?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:304701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]P-please hold on a second. There's no diving@or harpoon usage, understand?
From my past visit, the area to play in@by the water seems apt for safety...
(More noise...)

group_1.textRight: ...Oh, pardon me for this.@[chara:103401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103401:lipSynch_1][chara:103401:cheek_0][chara:103401:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json]Mhmm, fishing in safe waters...
A cast net?@You tried a fish trap?

group_1.textLeft: (She misheard me again...!?)
...I-I'm very sorry.@I'm not talking about catching fish.

group_1.textRight: Oh...my apologies!@I completely misunderstood you.
(...Was Miss Chika aiming for small animals@by the water?)
(Just from the top of my head, there are@softshell turtles, river prawns, frogs, and so on.)
(There are quite a number of@edible creatures there.)

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry, it's hard for you to hear me, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Not at all, it is all my fault@for jumping to conclusions!
When it comes to waterside activities,@your first order of business is...
Handling the balance between lightness of@movement and the weight of protection.
Seeing as though it is so deep in the mountains,@the heat is quite relentless.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I see...
(What she's pointing out is to choose between@a separate swimsuit or a one-piece, then.)

group_1.textRight: You can attempt to ambush from the thicket,@can't you?

group_1.textLeft: Ambushing is...not common though, I think...?

group_1.textRight: You are right about that.
In that case, I believe it is better to@prioritize lightness over protection.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, prioritize lightness...@Then a separate one it is.

group_1.textRight: Another thing to take into account is camouflage.
Blending into your surroundings is@extremely important.

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah, that's true!
(It would be embarrassing to have a swimsuit@that's completely different from everyone else's...)

group_1.textRight: Of course, the standard is a base green pattern.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, green is standard...

group_1.textRight: Though blending into the environment comes@with the danger of being accidentally shot.
When hunting in the winter,@such patterns should always be avoided,
but hunting in the summer is strictly prohibited,@so such worries are unnecessary.

group_1.textLeft: ...?@[wait:2][chara:304701:lipSynch_1]O-okay...I won't wear it in the winter, then...

group_1.textRight: It would be perfect camouflage if it@utilizes plants such as ivy.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:304701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I-ivy...!?
(I'm unable to find any swimsuits like that,)
(but maybe adorning it with flower accessories@would be good enough...?)

group_1.textCenter: A green colored, separated swimsuit...@And flower accessories, there...

group_1.textLeft: ...Chika, your swimsuit looks very adorable.

group_1.textRight: Sure does! The green gives it a@"forest dweller" impression!

group_1.textLeft: ...And the abundant floral decorations are lovely.

group_1.textRight: I find it nice as well.@It blends right into the very nature of our village.

group_1.textLeft: Th...Thank you so much.
I chose it based on Asahi's advice.

group_1.textRight: Ehhh...that's a shocker.

group_1.textLeft: It is?

group_1.textRight: Nah...it's just camouflage and the like seems@like something she'd suggest, dunnit?

group_1.textLeft: I don't think Asahi would go that far.

group_1.textRight: Hahaha, you're right about that!

group_1.narration: Of course, the standard is a base green pattern.
It would be perfect [textRed:camouflage] if it@utilizes plants such as ivy.
It was in that moment I realized that there@was miscommunication between us...
But there were no problems,@so it's fine!
